mozilla.components.browser.session

Interface Session.Observer

  • Enclosing class:
    Session

    public static Session.Observer

    Interface to be implemented by classes that want to observe a session.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Observer.DefaultImpls
      Interface to be implemented by classes that want to observe a session.
